name: restaurant_search
description: Find restaurants and dining options in specific locations. Automatically filters out listing sites like Yelp/TripAdvisor to find actual restaurant information. Handles natural language queries like 'Italian food near me' or 'best sushi in Seattle'.

query.description: The restaurant search query from the user (e.g., 'Italian restaurants', 'best pizza places')

location.description: The location to search in (e.g., 'New York', 'downtown Seattle', 'Chicago'). If not provided, system will try to extract from query

cuisine.description: Optional cuisine type to filter by (e.g., 'Italian', 'sushi', 'Mexican')
